name: bitnitex-project-tracker
description: Interactive architecture diagram viewer and project tracker for BitniTex

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install
scripts.start: npm run install:all && concurrently "npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run start:dev"
scripts.start:quick: concurrently "npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run start:dev"
